problem.markdown:
>> Which statement is NOT true below, in the analysis of Deterministic Processing Time, Two-Machine, Finite-Buffer Flow Lines?<< ( ) the buffer level cannot change by more than one part in one time unit; (X) the buffer level must go down by one for a transition in one time unit; ( ) the total number of states is 2 times 2 times capital N plus 1. (N is the buffer size.)
[explanation] The buffer level can go up or down by one, or remains the same in one time unit, based on the states of the two machines. [explanation]
